text: hamane jo rasool bhee bheja, isalie bheja ki allaah kee anumati se usakee aagya ka paalan kiya jae. aur yadi yah us samay, jabaki inhonne svayan apane oopar zulm kiya tha, tumhaare paas aa jaate aur allaah se kshama kee praarthana karata to nishchay hee ve allaah ko atyant kshamaasheel aur dayaavaan paate
